code: import React,{useRef}from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{filterProductsAction,filterProductsPriceAction,sortProductsAction}from"../../store/productsReducer";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Filtration(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var formRef=useRef();function setMinMaxPrice(e){var data=new FormData(formRef.current);data=Object.fromEntries(data);data.max_price=!data.max_price?Infinity:+data.max_price;data.min_price=!data.min_price?-Infinity:+data.min_price;dispatch(filterProductsPriceAction(data));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filtration",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price_filtration",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{ref:formRef,onChange:function onChange(e){return setMinMaxPrice(e);},className:"MinMaxPrice",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"min_price",type:"number",placeholder:"from"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"max_price",type:"number",placeholder:"to"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Items on sale"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:function onChange(e){return dispatch(filterProductsAction(e.target.checked));},type:"checkbox"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"select_filtration",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Sort:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{onChange:function onChange(e){return dispatch(sortProductsAction(e.target.value));},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:0,children:"default"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:1,children:"Price Descending"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:2,children:"Ascending price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:3,children:"alphabetically"})]})]})]})});}export default Filtration;
